imdb.title: Innovations with Ed Begley Jr
akas: Innovations with Ed Begley Jr (United States)
plot: Innovations is an award-winning television series hosted by actor, director and environmentalist, Ed Begley Jr. Innovations is dedicated to bringing viewers the most up-to-date, cutting edge information across a vast array of industries.::Sarah Cass
